resources.string:
Connection method is http POST Content type is application/json
An api-key and partnerCode would be given to each partner to validate requests The partner must include in the header of your request the following parameters partnerCode: access code generated for the partner by the system hash: A SHA-256 hash of request JSON string + the partner Api-key
The request will be a RAW POST directly to stream and NOT in a parameter This endpoint should be called when a new patient signs up for the medical records service
Please reference the table below for request parameters for obtaining a list of patients for a particular doctor
URL: https://apptualise.net/medirec/api/patients.
